oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-10-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 19, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 941st broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hawkshaw Hawkins; Rod Brasfield; Jimmy C. Newman; Sammy Barnhart; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- Sensation (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Jimmy Newman -- Cry, Cry Darling (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins talks -- Katy Hill -- Hawkshaw Hawkins talks -- Blessed Jesus Hold My Hand (Hawkshaw Hawkins, Sammy Barnhart) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Chet Atkins -- Gay Ranchero (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Barnhart, Sammy; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963; Newman, Jimmy C.
